## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat`: New feature
- [ ] `fix`: Bug fix
- [ ] `refactor`: Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] `docs`: Documentation only
- [ ] `test`: Adding or updating tests
- [ ] `chore`: Maintenance tasks

## Architecture Compliance

- [ ] Follows Hexagonal Architecture (Backend) / Feature-Sliced Design (Frontend)
- [ ] No leakage of domain logic into infrastructure layers
- [ ] New dependencies are justified and documented

## Testing

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests verified
- [ ] E2E tests updated (if applicable)
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`task check`)

## Observability

- [ ] Appropriate logging added (structured JSON format)
- [ ] OpenTelemetry spans added for new operations (if applicable)
- [ ] Error handling follows project conventions

## Documentation

- [ ] Code is self-documenting with clear naming
- [ ] Complex logic has explanatory comments
- [ ] API changes documented (if applicable)
- [ ] ADR created for architectural decisions (if applicable)

## Pre-merge Checklist

- [ ] **English Only**: All comments, commit messages, and docs are in English
- [ ] **Atomic Commits**: Each commit does one thing only
- [ ] **Conventional Commits**: All commits follow `type(scope): description` format
- [ ] **No Secrets**: No hardcoded credentials or sensitive data
- [ ] **Linters Pass**: `task check` passes without errors
- [ ] **Self-reviewed**: I have reviewed my own code
